Subject: amber ff14SB
Value: ff14SB is a protein force-field type, compatible with TIP3P water model.@en

Subject: π-π interactions
Value: π–π interaction is a particular type of dispersion force from van der Waals forces, which is established between unsaturated (poly)cyclic molecules.@en

Subject: memembed
Value: memembed is a software to determine the membrane proteins orientation inside cell membranes/lipid bilayers.@en

Subject: pKa tool
Value: pKa Tool  is a tool that predicts the pKa values of ionizable groups in protein at the specified pH.@en

Subject: tleap
Value: tleap is used to prepare molecular systems for simulation, including generating topology and coordinate files needed to run molecular dynamics. Tleap loads molecular structures (e.g., from PDB files), applies force field parameters, adds solvent and ions, sets up periodic boundary conditions, and generates AMBER topology (.prmtop) and coordinate (.inpcrd) files, all of which are essential steps in preparing molecular systems for simulation.@en

Subject: p-value
Value: p-value represents the likelihood of obtaining your observed results if the null hypothesis (the assumption that there's no real effect or difference) were true.@en

Subject: binding free energy
Value: ΔG(binding) is the binding free energy, calculated by: ΔG(binding) = G(complex) - [G(receptor) + G(ligand)].@en

Subject: solvation-free energy of ligand
Value: ΔG(solvated) is the solvation free energy associated with the ligand. It represents the free energy change when the ligand is transferred from vacuum to solvent (typically water). This term accounts for the interactions between the ligand and the solvent molecules.@en

Subject: electrostatic energy change
Value: ΔE(ele) is the change in electrostatic energy.@en

Subject: pyMBAR
Value: pyMBAR is a Python implementation of the Multistate Bennett Acceptance Ratio (MBAR) method. MBAR is a statistical technique used to estimate free energies and expectation values from multiple equilibrium states in molecular simulations. pyMBAR provides a set of tools to perform these calculations on simulation data.@en

Subject: aug-cc-pVQZ-RI
Value: resolution of identity auxiliary basis set designed for use with aug-cc-pVQZ, making high-accuracy calculations with diffuse functions more computationally feasible. (UNVERIFIED)@en

Subject: resolution-based force field
Value: classification of force fields based on the level of detail in representing molecular structures, determining computational cost and accuracy tradeoffs in molecular simulations. (UNVERIFIED)@en
